rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示心脏健康监测和医生共享之间的差距技术的进步使人们越来越容易地自我监测心脏健康状况，无论是通过手腕或手指上的智能设备还是血压监测仪。然而，俄亥俄州立大学韦克斯纳医学中心委托进行的一项新的全国调查发现，虽然许多美国人使用设备来监测他们的心脏，但很少有人与他们的医生分享这些数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Gap- Between-heart-health-monitoring-and-doctor-sharing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Gap- Between-heart-health-monitoring-and-doctor-sharing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c47a24c-2b5e-45db-903c-8fb0f7f830e2 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 02:48:00 -0500 Study reveals gap between heart health monitoring and doctor sharing
创新研究将生物识别数据与轮班工人的情绪预测联系起来新冠病毒大流行还带来了精神疾病的大流行。全球大约有十亿人患有各种精神疾病。韩国是情况较严重的国家之一，约有180万患者表现出抑郁症和焦虑症，临床精神疾病患者总数五年内增加了37%，达到约465万。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Innovative-research-links-biometric-data-to-mood-prediction-in-shift-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Innovative-research-links-biometric-data-to-mood-prediction-in-shift-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abbb7db9-0b6d-44ee-92f7-9e92f818adf1 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 01:51:38 -0500 Innovative research links biometric data to mood prediction in shift workers
评估癌症患者的 CIH 咨询补充和综合医疗保健 (CIH) 是癌症护理的一个重要方面，许多患者寻求这些方法来控制治疗的症状和副作用。进行了一项名为“CCC-Integrativ”的对照实施研究，以评估 CIH 跨专业循证咨询计划在增强癌症患者的患者活性方面的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Evaluating-CIH-counseling-for-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Evaluating-CIH-counseling-for-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89e287d2-c690-4a0d-aee1-c7fb1641aced Wed, 22 Jan 2025 01:39:59 -0500 Evaluating CIH counseling for cancer patients
全球研究发现不同种族的糖尿病死亡风险不同虽然糖尿病护理的进步提高了生存率，但这项研究强调了死亡风险方面持续存在的种族差异，敦促采取量身定制的医疗保健策略来满足不同的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Global-research-uncovers-varying-diabetes-mortality-risks-by-ethnicity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Global-research-uncovers-varying-diabetes-mortality-risks-by-ethnicity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f68f400f-7078-433c-a83f-8b0a88cefce5 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 00:13:00 -0500 Global research uncovers varying diabetes mortality risks by ethnicity
肠道微生物群如何影响儿童肥胖肠道微生物群通过影响能量代谢、炎症和食欲调节，在儿童肥胖中发挥着关键作用，益生菌、饮食干预和粪便微生物群移植等新兴治疗策略显示出前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/How-gut-microbiota-impacts-childhood-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/How-gut-microbiota-impacts-childhood-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc5ea03b-73f8-4c74-8aa8-bb2ca8c9d91b Tue, 21 Jan 2025 23:48:00 -0500 How gut microbiota impacts childhood obesity
研究发现，肌肉脂肪渗透比体重指数更能预测心脏病风险骨骼肌脂肪浸润 (IMAT) 与冠状动脉微血管功能障碍和心血管风险增加有关，与 BMI 和传统危险因素无关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Muscle-fat-infiltration-predicts-heart-disease-risk-better-than-BMI-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Muscle-fat-infiltration-predicts-heart-disease-risk-better-than-BMI-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43a04beb-4ab3-4d5f-b5ae-7df135545b76 Tue, 21 Jan 2025 23:08:00 -0500 Muscle fat infiltration predicts heart disease risk better than BMI, study finds
专家警告说，气候变化正在加剧神经健康危机研究探讨了气候变化对神经健康的深远影响，重点关注气温上升、极端天气和空气污染如何加剧癫痫、中风和睡眠障碍等疾病，同时呼吁采取紧急研究和缓解策略来解决这些脆弱性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Climate-change-is-fueling-a-neurological-health-crisis-experts-warn.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Climate-change-is-fueling-a-neurological-health-crisis-experts-warn.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b0ed179-187a-425d-82d3-b73bfcab5509 Tue, 21 Jan 2025 22:48:00 -0500 Climate change is fueling a neurological health crisis, experts warn
科学家发现骨重塑过程的关键因素骨骼是构成人体骨骼的活组织，在实现身体运动方面发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Scientists-discover-ritic-factor-in-bone-remodeling-process.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Scientists-discover-ritic-factor-in-bone-remodeling-process.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dde72274-7f7c-42e3-912b-9e98db1918a4 Tue, 21 Jan 2025 22:00:00 -0500 Scientists discover critical factor in bone remodeling process
突破性研究将基因突变与衰老的表观遗传变化联系起来加州大学圣地亚哥分校医学院的研究人员发表的研究结果为一个老问题提供了新的线索：是什么导致了分子水平上的衰老？他们的研究结果发表在《自然衰老》上，描述了两种最被接受的解释之间前所未有的联系：随机基因突变和可预测的表观遗传修饰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Breakthrough-study-links-genic-mutations-to-epigenic-changes-in-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Breakthrough-study-links-genic-mutations-to-epigenic-changes-in-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0dfda90-4bf9-4d87-8022-504905e25d19 Tue, 21 Jan 2025 21:54:37 -0500 Breakthrough study links genetic mutations to epigenetic changes in aging
牛津大学研究人员呼吁建立框架来研究人工智能对青少年心理健康的影响牛津大学牛津互联网研究所专家发表的一篇新的同行评审论文强调，考虑到使用数字设备访问互联网的儿童和青少年迅速采用人工智能，人工智能研究需要一个清晰的框架和社交媒体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Oxford-researchers-call-for-framework-to-study-AIs-impact-on-youth-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Oxford-researchers-call-for-framework-to-study-AIs-impact-on-youth-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12c1f105-3a2b-4fb1-b3da-9c392b830efd Tue, 21 Jan 2025 21:51:00 -0500 Oxford researchers call for framework to study AI's impact on youth mental health
